data.actual_result: The message is highlighted as if you were editing it, but the keyboard doesn’t appear and the only way to get rid of it is to go into a different channel, then go back.
data.expected_result: Either an error message would appear or nothing would happen.
data.short_description: Broken highlight when trying to edit messages in blocked user DMs
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user you have messages with. - Block him/her. - Attempt to edit a message you’ve sent.
